title: Text of a Letter from the President to the Chairmen of Certain House and Senate Committees – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
July 30, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:In accordance with section 1279A of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115-91), I transmit herewith a strategy to improve defense institutions and security forces in Nigeria.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
